doc.field: Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)
Series D.III. New York City Buildings, Parks and Other Cityscapes (2002 and later)
Views from the Chrysler Building's 61st floor (44 photos + 5 emails)
Views from the Chrysler Building's 61st floor (44 photos + 5 emails)

Images made one evening and the following morning, after an overnight snowfall. Several images emphasize the eagles (2 with snow). Others are views to the east toward Brooklyn and Queens, west toward New Jersey, and south through Midtown and into lower Manhattan. Includes both broad views of skylines and detailed views of rooftops and specific structures (United Nations, MetLife Building, Empire State Building, Edward Koch Queensboro Bridge/59th Street Bridge).
